The sound is out of sync when played on a media player but ok if using VLC. Grab fearless link

As others have said, it goes out of synch when played on a standalone media player, like a portable hard drive connected to a TV, but perfectly in synch when played with VLC on a computer. It also stays in synch when burned to a DVD.
